display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=CxXuS2dLkgUQ7kNvwHdKW6s&_nc_oc=AdnYgn1QwtKiXNBQymXkAsMfLVOVGv4QhZ7wPWUASdUUB3O2RqJTbBD1X_FA6UzaPtuOao-o7_ANu1dj6QLew0GD&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=IBJhva9wd0iMBAxu2bFC1Q&oh=00_AfF0ontvvpZ3C12D5VTTJ1Y8f2id7aMrsqNRQ3LDhYaR_w&oe=6815AF1D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=N49xmh3Xb58Q7kNvwGSgN8c&_nc_oc=AdnsMObrIBJubbmvavRiSt5ZzXYAxZlvtUD_Ya3SfiYK4H1QavuT_3cM6kYT4YhtwpMoOWvYbxXTfEySP_iH3tTB&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=IBJhva9wd0iMBAxu2bFC1Q&oh=00_AfHgHkibsjW8mbScoAx6_9txbD_M3UpMWmNevKqqTGmW3w&oe=6815C912)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=V7UxnYlC3YMQ7kNvwF7VVOf&_nc_oc=AdnsLDDBHuKuS53k09XISRjnLTMNb6LwftZlyv_pWixpibGCIoyz-qZ0DBNhonK-W97T4fMrPsl1ieVv-dNZ4CGx&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=IBJhva9wd0iMBAxu2bFC1Q&oh=00_AfFiebPL2vzYOUyeFMhbjGufUoGP9gqE4e76zG4nNWIVXA&oe=681596E3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=nn6R3VKnph0Q7kNvwHhq9X2&_nc_oc=Adk2DMU04iZqI6FDwCO3Nf4FErls1FXiIl3wtDF-Dr4zICr1YUSTSwQy9C9Lf1YbQPMWF4f95Z5mEuogvnzHTnBL&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=IBJhva9wd0iMBAxu2bFC1Q&oh=00_AfGgCBU7ODLml5ZumxxgVCWBzvbarniybLPQGgS_DDQ4bQ&oe=6815C5AE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
